Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 105th overall pick, by West Texas in 1971...
Injured on 4/7/1971 with a Bruised Heel, out for 3 days...
Injured on 8/25/1972 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/24/1978, off Carlos Lopez (CC)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/7/1981, off Tony Acuña (GHG)...
Traded from West Texas to Coney Island on 2/12/1982 (Going to CI: C H. Prouty, LF A. Mejorado. Going to WT: 1B W. Tiller)...
